actionplan_id.comment: The action plan which this item belong to

responsible.comment: The name of responsible`s action plan

deadline.comment: The date responsible must finish the task

item_area_aspect_id.comment: The item and aspect matched on unit

user_id.comment: The user logged who inserted the action plan

area_id.comment: The id of the Management System (former Area)

audit_attachment_item_id.Comment: Auditoria que o anexo est√° associado.

audit_id.Comment: ID da auditoria que este item pertence

audits_audit_id.comment: The id of audit which this item belongs to

audit_practical_order.comment: If the document applies to the unit matched

audit_conformity.comment: If the unit matched is in conformity with the matched document item

audit_evidnece_compliance.comment: If unit is or not in conformity, whats the evidences

audit_control_action.comment: Description of which actions is taken about this document on the matched unit

user_id.comment: The user logged who inserted the audit

item_area_aspect_id.comment: The key matched document_id x area_id and aspect_id

customer_group_id.comment: The group of its customer belongs to

customer_id.comment: The customer that belongs this unit

attachment_item_id.Comment: Item do documento que o anexo est√° associado.

document_id.Comment: ID do documento que este item pertence

document_item_order.Comment: Ordem de exibi√ß√£o na lista de itens

document_item_observation.Comment: Observa√ß√µes do usu√°rio ref. ao item

document_id.Comment: ID do documento que este item pertence

document_scope_description.comment: Scope is the scope of the legal requirement in relation to the territory

status_description.comment: The status of document, like, if it is active or not

document_scope_id.comment: The scope this document can range (global, country, state or city) - (document_scopes model)

document_type.comment: The type of document. Commonly is a law or standard rule (norm).

document_date.comment: The date that this document was released

document_status_id.comment: The state id that this document applies (state model)

document_summary.comment: A small text that summarize the document text

document_state_id.comment: The region of country document is valid (filled when scope = state)

document_city_id.comment: The city of region (state) document is valid (filled when scope = city)

document_privacy_type.comment: 0 = public (available for all customers) / 1 = private (need to check table document_privacy_customers)

document_privacy_unit_id.comment: The unit that owns this document
